
{{alias}}( x )
    Computes the coversed cosine.

    The coversed cosine is defined as `1 + sin(x)`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value (in radians).

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Coversed cosine.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 3.14 )
    ~1.0016
    > y = {{alias}}( -4.2 )
    ~1.8716
    > y = {{alias}}( -4.6 )
    ~1.9937
    > y = {{alias}}( 9.5 )
    ~0.9248
    > y = {{alias}}( -0.0 )
    1.0

    See Also
    --------
